flatten_list function:
{1000: 0},
{10000: 0},
{100000: 0.01643},
{500000: 0.04859},
{1000000: 0.11669},
{2000000: 0.25631},
{5000000：0.75912},
{8000000: 1.04655},
{10000000: 1.12554}
